effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep. If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.
